content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a) and (b). Briefly describe ONE claim made in the excerpt. Briefly describe ONE historical development illustrated by the excerpt.
